newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Arnold Industries starts.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Arnold Industries starts.

text.p: -- Morgan Stanley said analyst Charles Rupinski initiated coverage of Arnold Industries Inc with a strong buy rating.
-- Rupinski estimated earnings at $1.05 per share for 1996, and $1.35 for 1997.
-- sees further expansion in high-growth truckload segment of market.
-- sees acquisition on LTL -- or less than truckload -- segment increasing earnings growth.
